mapper.insert: insert into bd_casecheck_pf (pfid, psnr, pfbz, fz, kf, ly, df, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, flag, px, ajpcid) values (#{pfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{psnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pfbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{kf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ly,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{df,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{px,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ajpcid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update bd_casecheck_pf set psnr = #{psnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pfbz = #{pfbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fz = #{fz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, kf = #{kf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ly = #{ly,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, df = #{df,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, px = #{px,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ajpcid = #{ajpcid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where pfid = #{pfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select pfid, psnr, pfbz, fz, kf, ly, df, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, flag, px, ajpcid from bd_casecheck_pf where pfid = #{pfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
